text: Cleryston David Novais (born 15 October 1992) is a Brazilian handball player for Beykoz Belediyespor and the Brazilian national team. He participated in the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster2019 World Men's Handball Championship roster ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male handball players Category:Expatriate handball players in Turkey Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Turkey
title: Cleryston Novais
